headline: Absolute worst
pros: Nothing. Everything is about the partners.
cons: Awful work environment. Ego's through the roof. No people skill.

headline: Poorly run organization
pros: World-class strategic analytical training. Heavy exposure to senior management. Excellent technical knowledge base.
cons: Extremely low compensation compared to market. Do not pay bonuses when stated or at all. Lack of respect for boundaries or work/life balance. Extreme nepotism towards children and friends of founders. Highly disorganized and dysfunctional work environment.
